title: WTB: 1887 N284 Buchner Gold Coin Indianapolis
author: Brent G.

posts.post_title: WTB: 1887 N284 Buchner Gold Coin Indianapolis
posts.post_content:
I'm hoping to pick up a single 1887 N284 Buchner Gold Coin card of any Indianapolis player — Denny, Glasscock, Meyers, Cahill, Polhemus, Seery, Shomberg, Arundel, McGeachy. Graded or ungraded — somewhere in the 1.5 to 3 range.

Thank you!
